嵾字的基本解释

嵾
cēn
〔嵾嵯〕长短、高低不齐，如“石嵾嵾以翳日。”
〔嵾岭〕即“武当山”，在中国湖北省。

嵾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cēn］
亦作“1”。
(1)见“嵾嵳”。
(2)见“嵾峨”、“嵾嵾”。

嵾字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嵾； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页318第16
【廣韻】楚簪切【集韻】【韻會】初簪切，?音參。嵾嵳，不齊貌。或作㠁。【揚雄·甘泉賦】增宮㠁嵯。或通作參差。

嵾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嵾字的起名意思

暂无。

uneven
Basic explanation of words
uneven
cēn
〔嵾嵯〕The length and height are uneven, such as "Shiweiwei Yiyi Ri."
〔嵾岭〕 is the "Wudang Mountain" in Hubei Province, China.
uneven
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cēn］
Also called "1".
(1) See "嵾嵳".
(2) See "嵾 E", "嵾嵾".
uneven
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嵾; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 318-16
[Guang Yun] Chu Hairpin Cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] First hairpin cut,? Sound parameters. Weiwei, uneven appearance. Or make 㠁. 【Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu】Zeng Gong 嵯. Or it's all mixed.
